name: In the Depths of the Sky
name_original: In the Depths of the Sky
description:
I don't have a computer running OSX or Linux so I will assume that no one does and not release versions of this so-called "game" for either operating system.

It's just a thing where you run through a repeating series of rooms in a random order and shoot things.

... If I tag this as satire, no one will care if it's bad, right?

This was created for the Games Made Quick???1 1/2 Game Jam using Unity. The music was created with the TyrellN6 synthesizer and the Reaper audio production app.
